Amanda Johnston (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Afrịka na Amerịka na-ede uri
A mụrụ ya na obodo East St
Louis, Illinois, ma o bi ugbu a na Round Rock / Austin, Texas
Amanda Johnston nwetara nzere Master of Fine Arts na edemede okike na Mahadum nke Southern Maine
Ọ bụ onye otu Stonecoast MFA, onye isi nchịkwa na onye guzobere Torch Literary Arts, na onye guzobere #BlackPoetsSpeakOut

Onye Affrilachian na-ede uri, onye bụbu Cave Canem Foundation Board President, na Austin Project Fellow, Torch Literary Arts founder na Black Poets Speak Out cofounder, Johnston bụ onye na-ede uri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike na Black Poets Speak Out, ọrụ vidio nke gụnyere ndị African American na-ede uri na-eme mkpesa maka omume ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii na uri, o gosipụtara ikpe na-ezighị ezi agbụrụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mba United States.
Johnston bụ onye kere ụdị uri a maara dị ka Genesis

Ọ bụ ụdị nke nwere uri ise edere na ogidi, ma gụọ site n'elu ruo na ala, tinyere uri nke isii ọzọ nke e kere site n'ịgụ kọlụm ise niile ọnụ, site n'aka ekpe gaa n'aka nri, na uri nke asaa nke e kere site na okwu na ahịrịokwu ndị dị na kọlụm ise, nke a na-agụkwa site n'aka ekpe gaa n'aka nri
Abụ ndị ahụ aghaghịkwa ịgagharị n'usoro oge site na oge.
